name: Jivdaya Charitable Trust Ahmedabad

address: Inside Panjrapole Campus, Opp Govt. Polytechnic,

briefDescription: Jivdaya Charitable truat is an NGO providing free treatment to owner-less and injured or sick animals and birds in major parts of Ahmedabad city. Our NGO purely works on donations. On an average JCT treats 3000 animals and birds every month. JCT works with 50 full time staff including 7 qualified veterinarians. It works over an areaof 23000 sq ft. This includes two separate hospitals one each for animals and birds, which are fully equipped with Multipara Monitor, Gas Anesthesia, Central Oxygen unit, X-ray machine,Ventilator machine, Fumigation machine, Air Purifier, Auto clave machine, Quatry machine,Cryo gun etc. Both type of surgeries are performed in animal OT i.e. orthopedic and soft tissue.
